project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the Zhejiang Power Development Project are to: 1) help meet rapidly expanding electricity demand in Zhejiang Province in a least-cost manner; 2) promote power sector reform including commercialization and corporatization of the provincial power enterprise; 3) upgrade management capabilities and systems to enable the enterprise to operate efficiently in a commercial environment; 4) promote competition at the generation level through establishment of market-oriented commercial arrangements between power generation and marketing entities; 5) encourage alternative financing strategies for power development; 6) improve supply side-efficiency through reduction of transmission and distribution losses; and 7) reduce environmental impacts of new generation. The project will include power sector reform, investment and institutional development components as follows: 1) a time-bound implementation plan for power sector reform, including commercialization and incorporation of the power company; 2) Beilungang Phase 2 consisting of the addition of three 600-MW coal-fired units at the Beilungang Power Station; 3) transmission network expansion and reinforcement by the addition of about 400 circuit-km of 500 kV transmission lines and 2,250 of 500 kV substations; 4) reinforcement of distribution networks in Hangzhou and Ningbo Municipalities; 5) engineering and construction management services for Beilungang Phase 2; 6) technical assistance in preparing the security package for the Wangjiangmen cogeneration plant, which will be developed by a foreign/local joint venture; and 7) technical assistance to assist in commercialization, establish a computerized financial managment information system (FMIS), improve transmission and distribution planning, upgrade environmental monitoring, and support ZPEPC training program.

P003642.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>浙江电力项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是：（1）以最低成本帮助满足浙江省迅速增加的电力需求；（2）促进电力行业改革，包括省级电力企业商业化和公司化；（3）提升管理能力，开展系统升级改造，使企业能在商业环境下高效运营；（4）通过制定发电和营销实体之间的市场化商业安排，促进发电领域竞争；（5）鼓励采用替代融资策略进行电力开发；（6）通过降低输配电损耗提高供方效率；（7）减轻新建发电企业的环境影响。本项目设有电力行业改革、投资和制度建设等三个子项目，具体内容如下：（1）有时限的电力行业改革实施方案，包括电力企业商业化和公司化；（2）北仑电厂工程，包括新增三台600兆瓦燃煤发电机组；（3）输电网扩建和加固，新增约400公里单回路500千伏输电线和2250兆伏安500千伏变电站；（4）杭州和宁波两市配电网加固；（5）北仑电厂二期工程管理和施工服务；（6）为望江门热电厂编制安全方案提供技术援助。该电厂将由一家中外合资企业承建；（7）提供技术援助，帮助实现商业化，建立计算机化财务管理信息系统，改进输配电规划，加大环境监测力度，支持浙江省电力公司培训项目。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
